nodes.text: The Great Gran Run was a trade route located in the galaxy, connecting the Expansion Region world Noe'ha'on and the Mid Rim planet Takodana. In 10 BBY, Governor Diles Anevi met with crime lord Dryden Vos to strike a deal to waive certain travel restrictions on Crimson Dawn starships using the Great Gran Run in exchange for financial contributions to charitable causes Anevi cared about.
